Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities

Utility classes, an injector, and a logger.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Injector.ValueProvider
    Provides a value for certain fields.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurationUtilities
    Contains utility methods that help when working with configurations and configuration elements.
    GenericsUtilities
    Provides utility methods related to generics.
    GlobalisationUtilities
    Provides utility methods related to globalisation.
    Injector
    Injects values into fields that are annotated with @Injected.
    Injector.ClassBasedValueProvider
    Provides a constant value if it can be assigned to a field.
    Logger
    Wrapper around an SLF4J logger.
    ParserUtilities
    Contains a number of utility methods that can be used by parsers.
    ReflectionUtilities
    Offers utility methods related to reflection.
    StringUtilities
    Provides utility methods related to strings.
    TemplateUtilities
    Offers utility methods related to templates and their elements.
    Utilities
    Contains general utility methods.

Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities Description

Utility classes, an injector, and a logger.
